com.vtls.opensource.text.xhtml
Class MicrosoftWordXHTMLSource

java.lang.Object
  com.vtls.opensource.text.xhtml.MicrosoftWordXHTMLSource

public class MicrosoftWordXHTMLSource
extends Object

An experimental class to get an HTML representation of a Microsoft Word Document.
